Config.Resource: SELECT id, borrow_id, investor_uid, FROM_UNIXTIME(add_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as investor_date, investor_capital, DATE_FORMAT(`upd_time`,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') update_date FROM lzh_borrow_investor WHERE id > {begin_id} AND id <= {end_id}
SELECT dept_id, rank FROM lzh_fmanager_maping WHERE uid={id} ORDER BY add_time DESC
